description:
Dive controller-first into unfamiliar territory, blast your way through a barrage of beats in this rhythm-music adventure.
- Retro-inspired controls!
- Beautiful boss battles!
- A thumpin’ chiptune-inspired soundtrack with special guest Bubblyfish!
- Easy, medium, and hard difficulty modes
- 20 bite-sized challenges separate from the main game
- Mind-melting challenges!
- Thought-provoking cutscenes!
name: BIT.TRIP CORE
intro: BIT.TRIP CORE marks the second phase of CommanderVideo’s strange and transcendental journey.
